message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life from the income statement provided.

Looking at the provided income statement, the relevant line item related to depreciation expense is labeled "Depreciation" with the amount 96479.34.

Since depreciation expense is the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, the value we are asked to find corresponds to that line item.

Therefore, the specific value of the accumulated systematic allocation (depreciation expense) on this income statement is 96479.34.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "96479.34"}}
```
